info.title: Messaging Service API
info.description: A service providing private and group messaging between clients.

post.description: Create a new Author with the given body and return the new Author.

get.description: Retrieve a list of Authors given some query parameters.

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: Whether to include (1) or exclude (0) archived Authors.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Will only retrieve Authors created before this Date (in milliseconds).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of Authors to retrieve.

get.description: Get an Author with the given ID.

put.description: Update an Author with the given body and return the updated Author.

delete.description: Delete an Author with the given ID, and delete/leave all associated Rooms and Messages.

put.description: Archive an Author with the given ID, and archive/leave all associated Rooms and Messages.

post.description: Create a new Room with the given body and return the new Room.

get.description: Retrieve a list of Rooms given some query parameters.

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: The Author ID to match against retrieved Rooms.

parameters.name: onlyActive
parameters.description: Whether to include (0) or exclude (1) Rooms where the given Author is not active.

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: Whether to include (1) or exclude (0) archived Rooms.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Will only retrieve Rooms updated before this Date (in milliseconds).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of Rooms to retrieve.

get.description: Get a Room with the given ID.

put.description: Update a Room with the given body and return the updated Room.

delete.description: Delete a Room with the given ID, and delete all associated Messages.

put.description: Archive a Room with the given ID, and archive all associated Messages.

post.description: Create a new Message with the given body and return the new Message.

get.description: Retrieve a list of Messages given some query parameters.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The Room ID to match against retrieved Messages.

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: The Author ID to match against retrieved Messages.

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: Whether to include (1) or exclude (0) archived Messages.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Will only retrieve Messages created before this Date (in milliseconds).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of Messages to retrieve.

get.description: Get a Message with the given ID.

put.description: Update a Message with the given body and return the updated Message.

delete.description: Delete a Message with the given ID.

put.description: Archive a Message with the given ID.
